named-query.name: findClassPeriodAtDateTime
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime <= :dateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :dateTime

named-query.name: findSubClassPeriods
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.superClassId = :superClassId

named-query.name: removeClassPeriods
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.classId = :classId

named-query.name: countClasses
named-query.query: SELECT count(c) FROM Class c, ClassPeriod cp WHERE c.classId = cp.classId AND (cp.classId = :classId OR :classId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(cp.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (cp.superClassId = :superClassId OR :superClassId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(cp.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (cp.startDateTime <= :endDateTime OR :endDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.endDateTime IS NULL OR cp.endDateTime > :startDateTime OR :startDateTime IS NULL)

named-query.name: findClasses
named-query.query: SELECT c, cp FROM Class c, ClassPeriod cp WHERE c.classId = cp.classId AND (cp.classId = :classId OR :classId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(cp.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (cp.superClassId = :superClassId OR :superClassId IS NULL) AND (UPPER(cp.description) LIKE :description OR :description IS NULL) AND (cp.startDateTime <= :endDateTime OR :endDateTime IS NULL) AND (cp.endDateTime IS NULL OR cp.endDateTime > :startDateTime OR :startDateTime IS NULL) ORDER BY c.classId, cp.startDateTime

named-query.name: listModifiedClasses
named-query.query: SELECT c.classId FROM Class c WHERE c.changeDateTime >= :dateTime1 AND c.changeDateTime < :dateTime2

named-query.name: cropPreviousClassPeriod
named-query.query: UPDATE ClassPeriod cp SET cp.endDateTime = :dateTime WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime < :dateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :dateTime

named-query.name: cropNextClassPeriod
named-query.query: UPDATE ClassPeriod cp SET cp.startDateTime = :dateTime WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime < :dateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :dateTime

named-query.name: removeEnvelopedClassPeriods
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime >= :startDateTime AND cp.endDateTime <= :endDateTime

named-query.name: findEnvelopingClassPeriod
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime < :startDateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :endDateTime

named-query.name: findOverlappedClassPeriods
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.classId = :classId AND cp.startDateTime < :endDateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :startDateTime

named-query.name: findOverlappedSubClassPeriods
named-query.query: SELECT cp FROM ClassPeriod cp WHERE cp.superClassId = :superClassId AND cp.startDateTime < :endDateTime AND cp.endDateTime > :startDateTime

named-query.name: findClassPeriodPropertyValues
named-query.query: SELECT pv FROM ClassPeriodPropertyValue pv WHERE pv.periodId = :periodId ORDER BY pv.name ASC, pv.index ASC

named-query.name: incrementCounter
named-query.query: UPDATE Counter c SET c.value = c.value + 1 WHERE c.name = :name
